instruction: How will AI affect the medical industry in the next 10 years?
output: AI is expected to have a major impact on the medical industry over the next 10 years. AI-powered systems will be able to accurately diagnose diseases, recommend treatments and provide patient feedback. AI-powered chatbots will be able to answer patients' questions quickly and help diagnose patients even in remote areas. AI can also help make hospitals more efficient and reduce administrative costs.
